comment: Hi! Do you all (MCBA) need $$ for legal defense? If so is there a link you'd like us to use to donate? I'm in Bham.

# ::snt Hi! Do you all (MCBA) need $$ for legal defense? If so is there a link you'd like us to use to donate? I'm in Bham.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / hi
            :mode expressive)
      :snt2 (n / need-01
            :polarity (a / amr-unknown)
            :ARG0 (y / you
                  :mod (a2 / all)
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (o / organization
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "MCBA"))))
            :ARG1 (d / dollar
                  :purpose (d2 / defend-01
                        :ARG1-of (l / legal-02)))
            :polarity (a3 / amr-unknown))
      :snt3 (h3 / have-condition-91
            :ARG1 (l2 / like-02
                  :ARG0 (w / we)
                  :ARG1 (u / use-01
                        :ARG0 w
                        :ARG1 (l3 / link)
                        :ARG2 (d3 / donate-01
                              :ARG0 w)))
            :ARG2 (s / so))
      :snt4 (b / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (ii / i)
            :ARG2 (c / city
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Bham"))))
